name: Red Hook DIY Spot
description: Community-built DIY spot in Red Hook's industrial waterfront area. Raw, creative, and constantly evolving.
history: Built and maintained by local skaters using found materials. Embodies the DIY skate spirit.
bestTimes: Weekends when the crew is building and skating.
transitDirections: F/G to Smith-9th St, walk south. B61 bus.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include DIY ramps, concrete transitions, ledges, creative obstacles. Urban architecture repurposed for skating.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Brooklyn skate scene in Red Hook. Built and maintained by local skaters using found materials. Embodies the DIY skate spirit.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: F/G to Smith-9th St, walk south. B61 bus.. Weekends when the crew is building and skating.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark â€” standard park etiquette applies.
